title: Frontend Development
description: Crafting engaging and responsive user interfaces with modern web technologies. Proficient in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and various styling frameworks like Tailwind CSS. I focus on creating intuitive and visually appealing user experiences that are both performant and accessible.

title: Backend Development
description: Building robust and scalable server-side applications and APIs. Experienced with Node.js, Express.js, Python (FastAPI/Django), and database management. I design and implement efficient and secure backend solutions that can handle high traffic and complex data operations.

title: Cloud & DevOps
description: Deploying and managing applications on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. Familiar with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines. I ensure seamless deployment, continuous integration, and reliable operation of applications in cloud environments.

title: Database Management
description: Designing and optimizing relational and NoSQL databases. Experienced with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis. I focus on data integrity, performance, and scalability to support robust application backends.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Developing cross-platform mobile applications using frameworks like React Native and Flutter. I build native-like experiences for both iOS and Android, focusing on performance and user experience.

title: UI/UX Design
description: Creating intuitive and aesthetically pleasing user interfaces. I focus on user-centered design principles, wireframing, prototyping, and ensuring a seamless user journey from concept to implementation.
